line.comment: * Make a trip to buy ware.
* $WorkspaceStruct - The data structure that describes available workspace.
* See dev manual for more details about data structures.
* $WareStruct - The data structure that describes ware settings.
* $WantedAmount - Optional parameter if you want to buy exactly specified amount.
* If specified then ship will try to buy that specified amount.
* If unspecified then will try to buy maximum possible amount.
* 0 (unspecified) - default mode as usual: fly & buy
* Positive return value means purchased amount.
* Negative return value means error. It may be for many reasons:
* the ship cannot transport specified ware, the ship has no free cargo space,
* the ship cannot load specified amount of ware, no station to sell, etc
* -1 - has no cargo space to load at least one unit of ware
* -2 - suitable supplier not found in specified workspace
* -3 - selected station has become technically unusable during the route
* -4 - selected station has become unusable at end of the route
* -6 - not enough cargo space (less than "% min. to buy")
* In "just fly" mode we are docked to the supplier
* In "buy or die" mode we had to buythe ware up to this point
* Exit with error code because this didn't happened
* In "just fly" mode arrived to the supplier

sval.val: Make a trip to buy ware.
$WorkspaceStruct - The data structure that describes available workspace.
See dev manual for more details about data structures.
$WareStruct - The data structure that describes ware settings.
$WantedAmount - Optional parameter if you want to buy exactly specified amount.
If specified then ship will try to buy that specified amount.
If unspecified then will try to buy maximum possible amount.
0 (unspecified) - default mode as usual: fly & buy
Positive return value means purchased amount.
Negative return value means error. It may be for many reasons:
the ship cannot transport specified ware, the ship has no free cargo space,
the ship cannot load specified amount of ware, no station to sell, etc
-1 - has no cargo space to load at least one unit of ware
-2 - suitable supplier not found in specified workspace
-3 - selected station has become technically unusable during the route
-4 - selected station has become unusable at end of the route
-6 - not enough cargo space (less than "% min. to buy")
In "just fly" mode we are docked to the supplier
In "buy or die" mode we had to buythe ware up to this point
Exit with error code because this didn't happened
In "just fly" mode arrived to the supplier
